text: main unhen[1] apanee aayaton (nishaaniyon) se pher[2] doonga, jo dharatee mein avaidh abhimaan karate hain, yadi ve pratyek aayat (nishaanee) dekh len, tab bhee usapar eemaan nahin laayenge; yadi ve supath dekhenge, to use nahin apanaayenge aur yadi kupath dekh len, to use apana lenge. ye is kaaran ki unhonne hamaaree aayaton (nishaaniyon) ko jhuthala diya aur unase nishchet rahe
